de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.math.statistics.distribution.estimator

Class AbstractLogMeanVarianceEstimator<D extends Distribution>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.math.statistics.distribution.estimator.AbstractLogMOMEstimator<D>
      • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.math.statistics.distribution.estimator.AbstractLogMeanVarianceEstimator<D>
  • Type Parameters:
    D - Distribution to estimate.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    DistributionEstimator<D>, LogMOMDistributionEstimator<D>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LogGammaLogMOMEstimator, LogNormalLogMOMEstimator

    public abstract class AbstractLogMeanVarianceEstimator<D extends Distribution>
extends AbstractLogMOMEstimator<D>
    Estimators that work on Mean and Variance only (i.e. the first two moments only).
    Author:
    Erich Schubert
